text:
@RepMarkGreen @SpeakerPelosi @realDonaldTrump HE IS RESPONSIBLE FOR THE DELAYED RESPONSE TO BEING TOLD COVID-19 was on its way to the USA and ignoring it to keep his voters in the dark. There should NOT be a hearing; he should be arrested for crimes against humanity!!!!
So 🖕🖕🖕🖕🖕🖕🖕🖕🖕🖕🖕🖕🖕🖕🖕🖕you.
